name: Shadence
description: Discover unique experiences in your city
overview:
Shadence is an application that helps people discover unique and interesting experiences in their city (starting with London), helping them make better use of their weekends and other free days.

Other similar existing services that help users discover places and activities are more of blogs and publications, and mostly cover places (even though they say ‘things to do’ most of the time it is again places). In addition to that, usually their websites are not well designed making it hard to find good activities.

Shadence is trying to solve this problem by not only helping its users discover unique and interesting experiences but also by providing them with a minimal and intuitive user interface to find out good experiences in minimal time.
